Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

New in 2.0a4¶

  • The sercore extension, together with most of the pydoop.mapreduce subpackage, has been rewritten from scratch. Now it’s simpler and slightly faster (much faster when using a combiner)
  • Opaque splits are now auto-deserialized to context.input_split.payload
  • JobConf is now fully compatible with dict
  • Compilation of avro-parquet-based examples is now much faster
  • The Hadoop simulator has been dropped
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

New in 2.0a3¶

  • Support for Hadoop 3
  • Support for opaque binary input splits
  • Moved terasort example to https://github.com/crs4/pydoop-examples

New in 2.0a2¶

  • Support for Amazon EMR

New in 2.0a1¶

  • Added support for Python 3
  • Dropped support for Hadoop 1
  • Dropped old MapReduce API
  • Dropped JPype HDFS backend
  • Added Terasort example
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements
